title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 7320.6 - Application for a change in maximum facility capacity
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 7320.6 - Application for a change in maximum facility capacity

State Regulations
(a) The director shall apply to the

Commission for a revision of the certified maximum facility capacity of a
facility upon a change in any of the factors delineated in section
7320.5
(b) of this

Part. (b) Such application shall be
made in writing and include the specific facts, reasons and special
circumstances underlying the request. (c) Within 60 days after receipt, the

Commission shall review such application and, following consultation with OCFS, forward its determination in writing to the director. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
7320.6

Adopted

New

York State Register September 26, 2018/Volume XL, Issue 39, eff. 9/26/2018

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
